name: Janeiro Hotel
address: Avenida Delfim Moreira, 696, Rio de Janeiro 22441-000
description: Soaking up the breeze, right bang smack on the sand, arms flung wide open to the Atlantic, this is JANEIRO. Located in the middle of Leblon's marvellous beach-culture, we bring Rio's bossa vibe to life. Nature is a joyful accomplice. And what about that view? The Cagarras islands scatter across a horizon blue as far as the eye can see. No make-believe needed here. At night, the Moon beams, and in the distance, the lights of Vidigal glitter and dance like fireflies. Pure poetry for the eyes, woven into the urban effervescence of the city. The barefoot simplicity of the beach finds its way into the smallest of details; from the rooms to the food, the music to the art, all is an extension of the golden sands out front. We sway to no other rhythm but Rio's.iHotelier/iStay

It offer a restaurant, a shared lounge and garden. Extras facilities include a 24-hour front desk, room service and free WiFi. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning and cable TV Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The Green Place Ibirapuera also offers several leisure and relaxation options, such as a swimming pool, hot tub, sauna and gym. Ciccillo Matarazzo Pavilion is less than 1 km from the accommodation, while Ibirapuera Park is a 16-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Sao Paulo/Congonhas Airport, 4 km from Green Place Ibirapuera.

name: Tivoli Mofarrej São Paulo
address: Alameda Santos 1437, Cerqueira César, Sao Paulo 01409-905
description: Tivoli Mofarrej São Paulo, a member of The Leading Hotels of the World, offers 5-star comfort and an unbeatable location, one block from both Paulista Avenue and MASP, in São Paulo's Jardins neighbourhood. Facilities include a luxury spa, 2 gastronomic restaurants and a stylish bar. Suites at Tivoli Mofarrej São Paulo have contemporary décor. All rooms feature lounges with orchid arrangements and some units offer stunning panoramic city views. Guests at Tivoli Mofarrej São Paulo can enjoy a rich breakfast buffet with croissants, eggs and French pastries. The Seen Restaurant & Bar features city views. Must bar offers craft cocktails, especially created by Brazil's best bartender award winner, Jessica Sanchez. Guests can also enjoy live music in the evenings. Anantara Spa, one of the 2015 World Spa Awards winners, is a Thailand-themed space dedicated to restoring balance and harmony between body and mind and offering different treatments and massages in an oasis of beauty, grace and tranquility. Guests can enjoy the outdoor acclimatized pool, a well-equipped gym, and 24-hour room service is available. Tivoli Mofarrej São Paulo is 500 metres from Cidade São Paulo shopping mall and 2 km from trendy Oscar Freire street. Cidade Jardim and JK shopping malls are located 6.5 km from the hotel. It is also 7 km from Congonhas Airport and 24 km from Guarulhos Airport.

name: Renaissance Sao Paulo Hotel
address: Alameda Santos, 2233, Sao Paulo 01419-002
description: Make the most of your stay in one of Brazils most captivating cities at Renaissance Sao Paulo Hotel. Benefit from our prime location in the Jardins district, just a few steps from iconic Avenida Paulista. Connect with the city by visiting the nearby museums, art galleries and cultural centers. Authentic experiences and flavors await around every corner at our hotel. Treat your family to a delicious Sao Paulo inspired meal at our signature restaurant or savor Japanese fare at Living Lounge Bar and Sushi. Pamper yourself at The Spa at Renaissance or visit our 24 hour Renaissance Fitness featuring ellipticals, stair climbers and a sauna, steam room. Our Wellness Floor includes an outdoor heated pool with a whirlpool spa and terrace. Host your next business or social event in our versatile venues. Stretch out in hotel rooms and suites that offer marble bathrooms and 24-hour room service, and gaze at the Sao Paulo cityscape from your oversized windows. Delight in discovery at Renaissance Sao Paulo Hotel.Marriott

name: Slim São Paulo Congonhas
address: Rua Baronesa De Bela Vista, 499, Sao Paulo 04612-002
description: Just a 5-minute walk from Congonhas Airport, this Slaviero hotel provides free WiFi throughout the property. With modern interiors, Slaviero Slim Congonhas provides soundproof rooms fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar and a work desk. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guests enjoy a daily buffet breakfast with fresh fruits, juices and a variety of breads and cakes. The restaurant also serves contemporary cuisine for lunch and dinner. Guests can easily reach downtown São Paulo through 23 de Maio Avenue. Ibirapuera Park and Morumbi Shopping Centre are within a 12-minute drive, while Ibirapuera Mall is 2 km away.

name: Hotel Unique
address: Avenida Brigadeiro Luis Antônio, 4700, Sao Paulo 01402-002
description: Unique boasts exquisite architecture and stunning views of São Paulo and Ibirapuera Park. Designed by renowned architect Ruy Ohtake, it is in the trendy Jardins area. The rooftop hosts a pool and the stylish Skye Restaurant & Bar. The hotel is 100% non-smoking. Free WiFi is available. With scenic views of the park, the 5-star accommodation at Hotel Unique features modern furniture, a hot tub and luxury amenities. It includes air conditioning and minibar. Suites also have a spacious seating area. A coffee machine is fitted in the room and guest can purchase their capsules with the hotel. Guests can enjoy contemporary cuisine at the Skye Restaurant & Bar, while listening to lounge music and admiring the city views. They can also select from a variety of exotic drinks at the beautiful lobby bar, decorated with design objects. The rooms located on the 2nd and 4th floors are under renovation. Renovation work is done until March 31st 2024

name: Hotel Fasano Sao Paulo Jardins
address: Rua Vittorio Fasano, 88, Sao Paulo 01414-020
description: Boasting an indoor pool and a fitness centre, Hotel Fasano São Paulo Jardins offers 5-star accommodations in the upscale Jardins district, just 250 metres from the luxurious Rua Oscar Freire street. Decorated elegantly in shades of light colours, rooms are spacious and bright, offering parquet floors and high quality wood and leather furniture. Guests will find air conditioning, garden views, flat-screen TV, a minibar and DVD player. Private bathrooms come with a shower and a hairdryer. At Hotel Fasano São Paulo Jardins guests can enjoy the distinguished Fasano Restaurant, renowned for its contemporary Italian cuisine and tastefully styled ambiance. For other sophisticated dining experiences, guests will find some of the finest restaurants in São Paulo within a 5-minute walk. After a relaxing visit to the spa and wellness centre, guests can enjoy a refreshing drink from the bar. The property also offers massages, meeting facilities, dry cleaning, a terrace and concierge service. The hotel is 1.2 km from Avenida Paulista, 2.2 km from Ibirapuera Park and 9.2 km from Congonhas International Airport. Guarulhos International Airport is 25 km away.

name: OYO Nações Unidas, Sao Paulo
address: Rua Moraes Navarro, 36, Taboão da Serra 04763-020
description: OYO Nações Unidas is located in São Paulo. Free WiFi access is available. Guarapiranga Reservoir is 2 km away, Interlagos Circuit is 4,4 km from this hotel, while Coração Sertanejo is 3.7 km away. Each room here will provide you with a TV and cable channels. Private bathroom also comes with a shower and slippers. Extras include bed linen. At OYO Nações Unidas you will find an airport shuttle, a 24-hour reception and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include an ironing service, a laundry and a vending machine. The property offers free private parking. The hotel is 18,8 km from São Paulo City Centre and 23,5 km from Tietê Bus Terminal. Arena Corinthians is at a distance of 40 km from this property. Guarulhos International Airport is 47 km away.

name: Urbanature Filme & Arte
address: R. Texas 695, Sao Paulo 04557-000
description: Featuring a garden and views of city, Hostel Urbanature is a recently renovated bed and breakfast set in Sao Paulo, 4.8 km from Ibirapuera Park. There is a private entrance at the bed and breakfast for the convenience of those who stay. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking. The units come with an oven, microwave, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. Some accommodation includes a balcony and a satellite flat-screen TV, Nintendo Wii as well as air conditioning. Additional in-room amenities include wine or champagne, fruits and chocolates or cookies. Buffet and continental breakfast options with warm dishes, fresh pastries and fruits are available every morning at the bed and breakfast. You can make your own food in the kitchen before eating in the private dining area, and the bed and breakfast also features a coffee shop. For guests with children, Hostel Urbanature offers an indoor play area. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy billiards on-site, or walking tours in the surroundings. Ciccillo Matarazzo Pavilion is 6 km from Hostel Urbanature, while MASP Sao Paulo is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Sao Paulo/Congonhas, 5 km from the bed and breakfast, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Grande Família Hostel Av paulista
address: 250 R. Herculano de Freitas, Sao Paulo 01308-020
description: Boasting a garden, shared lounge and free WiFi, G Família Hostel Av paulista is set in Sao Paulo, less than 1 km from MASP Sao Paulo and 1.8 km from Copan Building. The property is around 1.9 km from Pacaembu Stadium, 3.1 km from Sao Paulo Metropolitan Cathedral and 3.4 km from Sala São Paulo. Teatro Porto Seguro is 3.9 km from the hostel and Museu Catavento is 4.5 km away. All guest rooms feature bed linen. A à la carte breakfast is available every morning at the hostel. Pinacoteca do Estado de São Paulo is 4.8 km from G Família Hostel Av paulista, while Ciccillo Matarazzo Pavilion is 4.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Sao Paulo/Congonhas, 11 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Etoile Hotels Itaim
address: Rua Pedroso Alvarenga, 610, Sao Paulo
description: Located in Sao Paulo, 2.6 km from Ibirapuera Park and 3.3 km from Ciccillo Matarazzo Pavilion, Roomo Etoile GeorgeV Itaim Bibi offers an outdoor swimming pool and air conditioning. It is situated 3.4 km from MASP Sao Paulo and provides a lift. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The spacious apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking. Copan Building is 5.7 km from the apartment, while Pacaembu Stadium is 5.7 km away. The nearest airport is Sao Paulo/Congonhas Airport, 8 km from Roomo Etoile GeorgeV Itaim Bibi.

name: Estanplaza Funchal Faria Lima
address: Rua Funchal 281, Sao Paulo 04551-060
description: Surrounded by good restaurants and nightlife options in the heart of the Itaim district, the 4-star Estanplaza Funchal offers spacious rooms and suites with elegant décor and internet access. WiFi is offered free of charge. In between your sightseeing tours or business meetings, you can unwind at the on-site spa,where an array of services and therapies are offered. Rooms at Estanplaza are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar, a safety deposit box and a work desk. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. A rich breakfast is served without any additional charge at TOM Restaurant, where Brazilian and international dishes are served for lunch and dinner. A coffee shop is also found in the hotel, offering a variety of entertainment options and room service is available throughout the day. JK Iguatemi Mall and Shopping Vila Olímpia can both be reached within 500 metres, while Parque do Povo is just 600 metres away. Airport Congonhas is 6.5 km from Estanplaza Funchal Faria Lima.

name: Radisson Paulista Sao Paulo
address: Alameda Santos, 85, Sao Paulo 01419-100
description: With a location just a block from Avenida Paulista, Radisson Hotel Paulista Sao Paulo offers a simply delightful stay in the largest city in South America. Enjoy convenient access to the main corporate hub and world-class shopping of Sao Paulo. For a taste of local history and culture, visit the Sao Paulo Museum of Art and Casa das Rosas, both less than three kilometers from our hotel. Our amenities feature an outdoor pool, a fitness center, and expansive meeting space. Our contemporary rooms with free WiFi, minibars, and individual room climate control invite you to recharge after a busy day in the city. You can begin each morning with a complimentary breakfast at All Seasons Bar and Restaurant, located on site. Plus, you can earn rewards, including free nights and gift cards, with our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Grand Hyatt Sao Paulo
address: Avenida Das Nacoes Unidas 13.301, Sao Paulo 04578-000
description: Located in downtown Brooklin, São Paulo´s new commercial district, this hotel is just 6 km from Congonhas Airport. It offers 2 swimming pools, a wellness spa and views of the Estaiada Bridge. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All modern and bright rooms at Grand Hyatt São Paulo have ample windows that offer panoramic city views and exclusive housekeeping service. They provide a LCD TV with cable channels, a minibar and a work desk. Well-rated for its food quality, The Grand Hyatt features 2 restaurants which serve International food. Club Lounge is a renovated space on the 20th floor and offers exclusive services to guests. Breakfast and a cocktail are complimentary. Guests can relax at the sauna or the spa, which offers a selection of facial and body treatments, or make use of the indoor and outdoor swimming pools. This luxurious hotel also offers a recently refurbished fully equipped fitness centre, and a helpful staff, always willing to assist the guests. The 5-star Grand Hyatt is just 10 minutes from Itaim Bibi's neighborhood.

name: Palácio Tangará - an Oetker Collection Hotel
address: Rua Deputado Laercio Corte 1501, Sao Paulo 05706-290
description: Palácio Tangará - an Oetker Collection Hotel has a privileged location, amidst the greenery of the famous Burle Marx Park. The hotel offers 141 spacious rooms - including 59 suites - all with beautiful views of the park, which have a furnished balcony or terrace. The Hotel has two restaurants. The first is the award-winning Tangará Jean-Georges. In this fine dining, the menu features both an à la carte menu and a tasting served in 6 times and harmonized by our sommeliers. The only restaurant in South America by award-winning Chef Jean-Georges Vongerichten, who boasts a career of excellence in Michelin-starred cuisine. Pateo do Palácio is the hotel's open-air restaurant with a terrace overlooking the park, full of fruit trees. Every day we have live music with the best selection of Jazz, Blues and Bossa Nova. From Monday to Saturday a delicious Afternoon Tea is served and on Sundays the famous Sunday Brunch. Additional amenities include 9 event rooms, with a maximum capacity of 1000 people, including a ballroom for up to 600 people and terraces overlooking the park. The property also offers 2 heated swimming pools, sauna, jacuzzi, gym, Lancôme Absolue Spa, Pool BBQ on sunny Saturdays and children's recreation at the Kids Club. The nearest airport is Sao Paulo/Congonhas Airport, 6 km from Palácio Tangará.

name: San Juan Business Sao Paulo
address: Rua Aurora, 909, Sao Paulo
description: The 3-star San Juan Business São Paulo is located close to the Republic Square, with easy access to convention centers, theaters, cinemas, restaurants, parks, airports, subways and downtown. The Republic subway station is 50 metres away. All apartments are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable, minibar and internet access. Room Service is available 24 hours a day. The hotel also offers a restaurant, as well as a bar. A breakfast buffet is included and serves fresh fruit, a variety of breads, cold meats, cereals, scrambled eggs and a selection of hot and cold drinks. São Paulo's famous Paulista Avenua is 4 km away. Within a 2 km walk is the St Benedict Monastery, the Patio do Colégio landmark, Sé Cathedral and the Luz train station. The hotel is 12 km from Congonhas Airport and 26 km from Guarulhos International Airport.

name: Novotel São Paulo Morumbi
address: Rua Ministro Nelson Hungria, 577, Sao Paulo 05690-050
description: Novotel São Paulo Morumbi is a pet-friendly hotel located in a prime area of SP. Its modernly-designed and comfortable bedrooms have A/C and free WIFI. View of the Estaiada Bridge, office room, and room for people with disabilities are optional. Restaurant 365 serves breakfast, lunch and dinner, and drinks at the bar area. Enjoy our event hall, business centre, massage room, pool, gym, and kid's space.accorhotels.com

name: Intercity Interative São Paulo Jardins
address: Rua Jose Maria Lisboa, 555, Sao Paulo
description: Intercity Interative São Paulo Jardins offers air-conditioned rooms in Sao Paulo’s elegant Jardins district. The popular Paulista Avenue and Oscar Freire Street shopping area are both a 10-minute walk away. Modernly decorated with wooden furnishing, the air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a telephone, a work desk and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a shower. Intercity Interative São Paulo Jardins' restaurant serves Brazilian cooking as well as international dishes. A daily buffet breakfast is also offered and includes a wide selection of beads, cakes, cold cuts and hot and cold beverages. The hotel facilities include 24-hour reception, a fitness centre and private parking on site. Museu de Arte de São Paulo - MASP is 800 metres away, while Patio Paulista Shopping Mall can be reached within 2 km. Congonhas International Airport is 15 minutes away by car from Intercity Interative São Paulo Jardins.

name: San Juan Eco Hotel
address: Rodovia Das Cataratas Km 6, Foz do Iguaçu
description: The architecture of Eco Cataratas Resort was inspired by the Tupi and Guarani First Nations Culture, bringing a new lodging option to Foz do Iguaçu. When staying with us, enjoy comfort and fun. Our hotel has children's and adults' recreation, regional and international cuisine, spa, hot and wet sauna, gym, coworking space, gift shop, car rental and 3 swimming pools, one of which has an infinity edge with a length of 30m. Our breakfast offers the most diverse delights from the triple border and with international inspiration brought by the chef. The tourist attractions, which can be hired directly at the hotel's agency, are easily accessible due to the property's privileged location, which is on Rodovia das Cataratas, in the city's tourist corridor. Welcome to Eco Cataratas Resort, your newest accommodation in Foz do Iguaçu.

name: San Juan Tour
address: Rua Marechal Deodoro 1349 Centro, Foz do Iguaçu
description: Set in Foz do Iguaçu in the Parana Region, 13 km from Birds Park, San Juan Tour features a year-round outdoor pool and fitness centre. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. Room service is provided 24 hours a day. All rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with cable TV, minibar, work desk and other amenities. Bathroom is private. A bar and restaurant are also available on site, serving a specially varied buffet breakfast. At the San Juan Tour's tour desk, you can also book guided excursions to the main regional attractions. Iguaçu Waterfalls is 21 km from San Juan Tour, while Iguaçu National Park is 22 km away. The nearest airport is Foz do Iguacu/Cataratas International Airport, 11 km from San Juan Tour.

This guest house also includes a patio that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. The guest house offers bed linen, towels and laundry service. Guests at the guest house will be able to enjoy activities in and around Foz do Iguaçu, like hiking. Barbecue facilities are provided at the guest house, and guests can also relax in the garden or go on a picnic in the picnic area. Iguazu Casino is 7.8 km from MIAU Maison Internacional Alojamento Urbano, while Itaipu is 21 km from the property. Bathrooms are private and offer free toiletries and a hairdryer. You will find a 24-hour front desk and gift shop at the property. Iguaçu Waterfalls is 16 km from Interludium Iguassu Hotel by Atlantica, while Iguaçu National Park is 17 km away. The nearest airport is Foz do Iguacu/Cataratas International Airport, 6 km from the property.

The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels.The units at Hotel Foz do Iguaçu feature air conditioning and a wardrobe. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Guests can make use of the games room or relax at the green garden. Foz do Iguaçu also has spaces for events with a capacity of 1000 people. The property offers a 24-hour front desk, free WiFi and private parking. Foz do Iguaçu Hotel is situated in the city centre, close to several shopping malls, cafes, and restaurants. Foz do Iguaçu Airport is less than 15 km away.

Vivaz Cataratas Hotel Resort features free WiFi throughout the property. There is a 24-hour front desk, a shared lounge, babysitting service and gift shop at the property. You can play tennis at this hotel, and car hire is available. Iguaçu Waterfalls is 19 km from Vivaz Cataratas Hotel Resort, while Iguaçu National Park is 7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Foz do Iguacu/Cataratas International Airport, 4 km from Vivaz Cataratas Hotel Resort.

Among the various facilities of this property are a bar, a shared lounge and a garden. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and organising tours for guests. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV, tile/marble floor and a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel offers a buffet or American breakfast. Grand Carimã Resort & Convention Center offers a sauna and children's playground. You can play table tennis and tennis at the accommodation. Other facilities include a garden, shops, and a wide range of sports facilities. The hotel also provides large function rooms which are suitable for conventions, meetings and all kinds of celebrations. Iguaçu National Park is 16 km from Grand Carimã Resort & Convention Center, while Garganta del Diablo is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Foz do Iguacu/Cataratas International Airport, 7 km from the hotel.

The hotel has an outdoor pool and views of the city, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. Golden Park provides air-conditioned rooms with cable TV and a minibar. Bathroom is private and includes a hairdryer. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Fresh fruits, breads and cold meats are served on the breakfast buffet every morning. Tea, coffee cold drinks are also available. You can play table tennis and billiards Golden Park International. Iguaçu National Park is 22 km. The nearest airport is Foz do Iguacu/Cataratas International Airport, 12 km from Golden Park Internacional Foz & Convenções.

name: Aguas do Iguacu Hotel
address: Avenida Brasil, 84 - Centro, Foz do Iguaçu 85852-090
description: This hotel in Foz do Iguaçu centre is only 300 metres from the main public transportation hub, which offers easy access to Iguaçu Falls, restaurants and shops. The property features a pool and free WiFi. The air-conditioned rooms at Águas do Iguaçu Hotel Centro are bright and spacious, providing minibar, cable TV and telephone. Guests enjoy a regional specialties buffet, featuring a variety of regional delicacies such as cheeses, breads, fruits and hot meals. Breakfast can also be served in the room, for an extra fee. Guests at Águas do Iguaçu Hotel can enjoy a free transfer service from the airport to the hotel from 8:00 to 18:00, provided that you book this service 48 hours in advance, as well as other services such as a tour desk and luggage storage.

name: Ibis Foz Do Iguacu
address: Rua Almirante Barroso 866-Cent, Foz do Iguaçu
description: If you are looking for a hotel in Foz do Iguaçu, ibis Foz do Iguaçu welcomes you. name: Tropikalya Gold Hotel
address: Rua 401, 15, Balneário Camboriú 88330-696
description: Tropikalya Gold Hotel is in downtown Camboriú, conveniently located next to Atlantic Shopping Mall and only 150 metres from Central Beach. It features a pool with hydromassage jets, an outdoor heated pool and free WiFi. The 3-star accommodation at Tropikalya Gold Hotel has modern style and a touch of colour on the walls. Bright and air-conditioned, they provide TV and minibar. A buffet breakfast is served daily in the eating area, which displays contemporary décor and lively paintings. It includes a variety of tropical fruits, cakes and breads. Private parking is available upon reservation and the property offers airport shuttle. Camboriú´s bus station is 2 km away. For guests´ convenience, the front desk is open 24 hours a day.
